meaningMnemonic: You go down a <radical>street</radical> that cuts through a <radical>rice paddy</radical> and leads to a <radical>box</radical>. When you open the box at the end of the street, you see it's full of <kanji>image</kanji>s. Image after image. <kanji>Drawing</kanji>, <kanji>painting</kanji>, you name it. Someone must have left this box of images here.
readingMnemonic: Okay, I didn't want to tell you this, but the <kanji>image</kanji>s are all <kanji>drawing</kanji>s and <kanji>painting</kanji>s of <reading>ga</reading>rgoyles (が) and <reading>cock</reading>s (かく). Male chickens, that is. Turns out that's what you wanted to see most. Don't worry, no one is judging you.
